Project.title: Plante Fact Site
Project.projectDescription: Mind Passage provides users with a place to find theraphists and mental health tips.
Project.projectPoint2: Brought in react calender and connected to the custom built journal allowing users to save their entery and mood.
Project.projectPoint3: Implented Sweet Alert to notify the user when a post was saved or if somthing went wrong.
Project.projectPoint4: Assited with CSS throughtout the project
Project.projectPoint6: Used Axios to send user data to the backend
Project.projectPoint7: Used SendGrid to send an email to the user once account was created and to reset password

Project.title: Social doggy
Project.projectDescription: Social doggy allows users to search for local dog parks with just one click.
Project.projectPoint1: Hereâ€™s some of the tech I used during the project and how I implemented them during the project to further push my understanding and knowledge even further.
